How many people are affected by congenital sucrase-isomaltase deficiency ?,"The prevalence of congenital sucrase-isomaltase deficiency is estimated to be 1 in 5,000 people of European descent. This condition is much more prevalent in the native populations of Greenland, Alaska, and Canada, where as many as 1 in 20 people may be affected.",GHR,congenital sucrase-isomaltase deficiency
